creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Find your new property – whether apartment, house or commercial enterprise, for rental or purchasing, at any time and in any location. The app is fully translated to English and provides the largest range of real estates in Germany!

After you install the app and conduct a search you will receive push notifications when new properties are listed in the search. These push notifications can be disabled in the ‘Settings’ area of the app.

Search for real estate

Search for suitable apartments, flats, houses and commercial enterprises in the desired location, size and price category with the ImmobilienScout24 property finder app. Would you like to rent or buy an apartment or a house? Simply search for property and find your house or flat.

The Immobilien Scout24 search functions

• Simple and intuitive property search with filters for real estate.
• Search for flat or apartment sizes, number of rooms (one, two, three bedrooms...), facilities (balcony, kitchen, garden, roof terrace...), property type (maisonette, attic floor, office...).
• Targeted search for furnishing criteria (balcony, fitted kitchen, garden ...), number of rooms (one, two, three bedrooms...) property types (maisonette, roof storey, offices ...), apartments and houses for rent or purchase (rental apartments, owner-occupier apartments
...), commission-free real estate to rent or buy etc.
• Search for commercial real estate (e.g. search for: office, practice, catering, hall, retail trade – for rental, leasing or purchase).
• Messenger: Communicate directly with vendors securely within the home and rent app, with no need for email anymore. Easily keep track of your communication history with vendors.
• Apartment search: Display all properties available in the vicinity of your current position, or search for an address, town/city, postcode or
Scout-ID. You can use notifications to find out if a new property, corresponding to your search criteria, is available.
• Display all rental homes and purchase real estate for residences, commercial enterprises and residential plots as a list or map view.
• Synchronisation of the reminder list and saved searches with your ImmobilienScout24 Account.
• Sorting the order by your own presettings (price, living space, up-to-date status ...) within the real estate app.
• Reminder list function, which even makes your saved favourites (apartment, house or commercial enterprise) available offline, amongst
other features.
• Direct contact with the respective provider or real estate agent by phone or contact form.
• Forwarding the property to friends, acquaintances and people looking for somewhere to live (e.g. via email, Facebook, Google Plus).
• Your last search criteria are saved and can be called up again at a later date within the property and apartment finder.
• Almost all display resolutions are supported in the ImmobilienScout app.
• You need a device with GPS sensor for optimum use!
• Discover properties with the Immo Scout app. Find homes, houses, flat & apartments in different cities such as Berlin, Hamburg, Munich, Cologne, Frankfurt, Stuttgart, Dusseldorf, Dortmund, Essen, Leipzig, Bremen, Dresden, Hanover, Nuremberg, Duisburg, Bochum, Wuppertal, Bielefeld, Bonn, Munster, Karlsruhe and Mannheim.

-

We are working intensively on additional functions for our Android
Immobilien Scout24 search app and would be delighted to receive your
suggestions and ideas! What would you like to see in the next version? Let
us know: app-support@immobilienscout24.de
Your team at ImmobilienScout24

http://www.ImmobilienScout24.de
Like us on Facebook!
https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: For this version we did some design adjustments and made a few stability improvements.

title: ImmoScout24 - House & Apartment Search

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Find your new property – whether apartment, house or commercial enterprise, for rental or purchasing, at any time and in any location. The app is fully translated to English and provides the largest range of real estates in Germany!

After you install the app and conduct a search you will receive push notifications when new properties are listed in the search. These push notifications can be disabled in the ‘Settings’ area of the app.

Search for real estate

Search for suitable apartments, flats, houses and commercial enterprises in the desired location, size and price category with the ImmobilienScout24 property finder app. Would you like to rent or buy an apartment or a house? Simply search for property and find your house or flat.

The Immobilien Scout24 search functions

• Simple and intuitive property search with filters for real estate.
• Search for flat or apartment sizes, number of rooms (one, two, three bedrooms...), facilities (balcony, kitchen, garden, roof terrace...), property type (maisonette, attic floor, office...).
• Targeted search for furnishing criteria (balcony, fitted kitchen, garden ...), number of rooms (one, two, three bedrooms...) property types (maisonette, roof storey, offices ...), apartments and houses for rent or purchase (rental apartments, owner-occupier apartments
...), commission-free real estate to rent or buy etc.
• Search for commercial real estate (e.g. search for: office, practice, catering, hall, retail trade – for rental, leasing or purchase).
• Messenger: Communicate directly with vendors securely within the home and rent app, with no need for email anymore. Easily keep track of your communication history with vendors.
• Apartment search: Display all properties available in the vicinity of your current position, or search for an address, town/city, postcode or
Scout-ID. You can use notifications to find out if a new property, corresponding to your search criteria, is available.
• Display all rental homes and purchase real estate for residences, commercial enterprises and residential plots as a list or map view.
• Synchronisation of the reminder list and saved searches with your ImmobilienScout24 Account.
• Sorting the order by your own presettings (price, living space, up-to-date status ...) within the real estate app.
• Reminder list function, which even makes your saved favourites (apartment, house or commercial enterprise) available offline, amongst
other features.
• Direct contact with the respective provider or real estate agent by phone or contact form.
• Forwarding the property to friends, acquaintances and people looking for somewhere to live (e.g. via email, Facebook, Google Plus).
• Your last search criteria are saved and can be called up again at a later date within the property and apartment finder.
• Almost all display resolutions are supported in the ImmobilienScout app.
• You need a device with GPS sensor for optimum use!
• Discover properties with the Immo Scout app. Find homes, houses, flat & apartments in different cities such as Berlin, Hamburg, Munich, Cologne, Frankfurt, Stuttgart, Dusseldorf, Dortmund, Essen, Leipzig, Bremen, Dresden, Hanover, Nuremberg, Duisburg, Bochum, Wuppertal, Bielefeld, Bonn, Munster, Karlsruhe and Mannheim.

-

We are working intensively on additional functions for our Android
Immobilien Scout24 search app and would be delighted to receive your
suggestions and ideas! What would you like to see in the next version? Let
us know: app-support@immobilienscout24.de
Your team at ImmobilienScout24

http://www.ImmobilienScout24.de
Like us on Facebook!
https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: For this version we did some design adjustments and made a few stability improvements.

title: ImmoScout24 - House & Apartment Search

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Find your new property – whether apartment, house or commercial enterprise, for rental or purchasing, at any time and in any location. The app is fully translated to English and provides the largest range of real estates in Germany!

After you install the app and conduct a search you will receive push notifications when new properties are listed in the search. These push notifications can be disabled in the ‘Settings’ area of the app.

Search for real estate

Search for suitable apartments, flats, houses and commercial enterprises in the desired location, size and price category with the ImmobilienScout24 property finder app. Would you like to rent or buy an apartment or a house? Simply search for property and find your house or flat.

The Immobilien Scout24 search functions

• Simple and intuitive property search with filters for real estate.
• Search for flat or apartment sizes, number of rooms (one, two, three bedrooms...), facilities (balcony, kitchen, garden, roof terrace...), property type (maisonette, attic floor, office...).
• Targeted search for furnishing criteria (balcony, fitted kitchen, garden ...), number of rooms (one, two, three bedrooms...) property types (maisonette, roof storey, offices ...), apartments and houses for rent or purchase (rental apartments, owner-occupier apartments
...), commission-free real estate to rent or buy etc.
• Search for commercial real estate (e.g. search for: office, practice, catering, hall, retail trade – for rental, leasing or purchase).
• Messenger: Communicate directly with vendors securely within the home and rent app, with no need for email anymore. Easily keep track of your communication history with vendors.
• Apartment search: Display all properties available in the vicinity of your current position, or search for an address, town/city, postcode or
Scout-ID. You can use notifications to find out if a new property, corresponding to your search criteria, is available.
• Display all rental homes and purchase real estate for residences, commercial enterprises and residential plots as a list or map view.
• Synchronisation of the reminder list and saved searches with your ImmobilienScout24 Account.
• Sorting the order by your own presettings (price, living space, up-to-date status ...) within the real estate app.
• Reminder list function, which even makes your saved favourites (apartment, house or commercial enterprise) available offline, amongst
other features.
• Direct contact with the respective provider or real estate agent by phone or contact form.
• Forwarding the property to friends, acquaintances and people looking for somewhere to live (e.g. via email, Facebook, Google Plus).
• Your last search criteria are saved and can be called up again at a later date within the property and apartment finder.
• Almost all display resolutions are supported in the ImmobilienScout app.
• You need a device with GPS sensor for optimum use!
• Discover properties with the Immo Scout app. Find homes, houses, flat & apartments in different cities such as Berlin, Hamburg, Munich, Cologne, Frankfurt, Stuttgart, Dusseldorf, Dortmund, Essen, Leipzig, Bremen, Dresden, Hanover, Nuremberg, Duisburg, Bochum, Wuppertal, Bielefeld, Bonn, Munster, Karlsruhe and Mannheim.

-

We are working intensively on additional functions for our Android
Immobilien Scout24 search app and would be delighted to receive your
suggestions and ideas! What would you like to see in the next version? Let
us know: app-support@immobilienscout24.de
Your team at ImmobilienScout24

http://www.ImmobilienScout24.de
Like us on Facebook!
https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24

title: ImmoScout24 - House & Apartment Search

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Find your new property – whether apartment, house or commercial enterprise, for rental or purchasing, at any time and in any location. The app is fully translated to English and provides the largest range of real estates in Germany!

After you install the app and conduct a search you will receive push notifications when new properties are listed in the search. These push notifications can be disabled in the ‘Settings’ area of the app.

Search for real estate

Search for suitable apartments, flats, houses and commercial enterprises in the desired location, size and price category with the ImmobilienScout24 property finder app. Would you like to rent or buy an apartment or a house? Simply search for property and find your house or flat.

The Immobilien Scout24 search functions

• Simple and intuitive property search with filters for real estate.
• Search for flat or apartment sizes, number of rooms (one, two, three bedrooms...), facilities (balcony, kitchen, garden, roof terrace...), property type (maisonette, attic floor, office...).
• Targeted search for furnishing criteria (balcony, fitted kitchen, garden ...), number of rooms (one, two, three bedrooms...) property types (maisonette, roof storey, offices ...), apartments and houses for rent or purchase (rental apartments, owner-occupier apartments
...), commission-free real estate to rent or buy etc.
• Search for commercial real estate (e.g. search for: office, practice, catering, hall, retail trade – for rental, leasing or purchase).
• Messenger: Communicate directly with vendors securely within the home and rent app, with no need for email anymore. Easily keep track of your communication history with vendors.
• Apartment search: Display all properties available in the vicinity of your current position, or search for an address, town/city, postcode or
Scout-ID. You can use notifications to find out if a new property, corresponding to your search criteria, is available.
• Display all rental homes and purchase real estate for residences, commercial enterprises and residential plots as a list or map view.
• Synchronisation of the reminder list and saved searches with your ImmobilienScout24 Account.
• Sorting the order by your own presettings (price, living space, up-to-date status ...) within the real estate app.
• Reminder list function, which even makes your saved favourites (apartment, house or commercial enterprise) available offline, amongst
other features.
• Direct contact with the respective provider or real estate agent by phone or contact form.
• Forwarding the property to friends, acquaintances and people looking for somewhere to live (e.g. via email, Facebook, Google Plus).
• Your last search criteria are saved and can be called up again at a later date within the property and apartment finder.
• Almost all display resolutions are supported in the ImmobilienScout app.
• You need a device with GPS sensor for optimum use!
• Discover properties with the Immo Scout app. Find homes, houses, flat & apartments in different cities such as Berlin, Hamburg, Munich, Cologne, Frankfurt, Stuttgart, Dusseldorf, Dortmund, Essen, Leipzig, Bremen, Dresden, Hanover, Nuremberg, Duisburg, Bochum, Wuppertal, Bielefeld, Bonn, Munster, Karlsruhe and Mannheim.

-

We are working intensively on additional functions for our Android
Immobilien Scout24 search app and would be delighted to receive your
suggestions and ideas! What would you like to see in the next version? Let
us know: app-support@immobilienscout24.de
Your team at ImmobilienScout24

http://www.ImmobilienScout24.de
Like us on Facebook!
https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24

title: ImmoScout24 - House & Apartment Search

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Find your new property – whether apartment, house or commercial enterprise, for rental or purchasing, at any time and in any location. The app is fully translated to English and provides the largest range of real estates in Germany!

After you install the app and conduct a search you will receive push notifications when new properties are listed in the search. These push notifications can be disabled in the ‘Settings’ area of the app.

Search for real estate

Search for suitable apartments, flats, houses and commercial enterprises in the desired location, size and price category with the ImmobilienScout24 property finder app. Would you like to rent or buy an apartment or a house? Simply search for property and find your house or flat.

The Immobilien Scout24 search functions

• Simple and intuitive property search with filters for real estate.
• Search for flat or apartment sizes, number of rooms (one, two, three bedrooms...), facilities (balcony, kitchen, garden, roof terrace...), property type (maisonette, attic floor, office...).
• Targeted search for furnishing criteria (balcony, fitted kitchen, garden ...), number of rooms (one, two, three bedrooms...) property types (maisonette, roof storey, offices ...), apartments and houses for rent or purchase (rental apartments, owner-occupier apartments
...), commission-free real estate to rent or buy etc.
• Search for commercial real estate (e.g. search for: office, practice, catering, hall, retail trade – for rental, leasing or purchase).
• Messenger: Communicate directly with vendors securely within the home and rent app, with no need for email anymore. Easily keep track of your communication history with vendors.
• Apartment search: Display all properties available in the vicinity of your current position, or search for an address, town/city, postcode or
Scout-ID. You can use notifications to find out if a new property, corresponding to your search criteria, is available.
• Display all rental homes and purchase real estate for residences, commercial enterprises and residential plots as a list or map view.
• Synchronisation of the reminder list and saved searches with your ImmobilienScout24 Account.
• Sorting the order by your own presettings (price, living space, up-to-date status ...) within the real estate app.
• Reminder list function, which even makes your saved favourites (apartment, house or commercial enterprise) available offline, amongst
other features.
• Direct contact with the respective provider or real estate agent by phone or contact form.
• Forwarding the property to friends, acquaintances and people looking for somewhere to live (e.g. via email, Facebook, Google Plus).
• Your last search criteria are saved and can be called up again at a later date within the property and apartment finder.
• Almost all display resolutions are supported in the ImmobilienScout app.
• You need a device with GPS sensor for optimum use!
• Discover properties with the Immo Scout app. Find homes, houses, flat & apartments in different cities such as Berlin, Hamburg, Munich, Cologne, Frankfurt, Stuttgart, Dusseldorf, Dortmund, Essen, Leipzig, Bremen, Dresden, Hanover, Nuremberg, Duisburg, Bochum, Wuppertal, Bielefeld, Bonn, Munster, Karlsruhe and Mannheim.

-

We are working intensively on additional functions for our Android
Immobilien Scout24 search app and would be delighted to receive your
suggestions and ideas! What would you like to see in the next version? Let
us know: app-support@immobilienscout24.de
Your team at ImmobilienScout24

http://www.ImmobilienScout24.de
Like us on Facebook!
https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24

descriptionShort: Find, rent and buy real estate or property in Germany with the Immo Scout app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: For this version we did some design adjustments and made a few stability improvements.

title: ImmoScout24 - House & Apartment Search

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Whether renting, buying, or selling, either privately or commercially: We are Germany's number #1 for real estate!

Looking for a property for rent? Search for your dream home quickly and easily in our app. Just enter your search criteria – done.

Are you looking for a property for sale? Find your new home: Whether it's an apartment, terraced house, detached house or villa - you'll find a wide selection on our platform.

Or do you want to rent or sell a property? With the high reach of ImmoScout24, you can easily find the right tenants and buyers. Simply create a property ad in the app.

Narrow your search:
Search with many filter options (including apartment size, number of rooms, equipment criteria) near your current location, near a specific address or simply draw an area on the map.

Travel time calculator:
Let us calculate the travel time from the property to the places that are important to you (e.g. work, daycare, school...) right in the app.

Shortlist:
Keep track of already contacted and saved objects. Invite a person to share your shortlist with so you can keep track of your favorite properties.

Personal profile:
Create and edit your profile in the app and increase the chances of getting your dream property as soon as you make contact.

Messenger:
Communicate quickly and securely with providers via our messenger - directly in the app. Thanks to instant notifications, you're always up to date and can reply to messages immediately.

Push notifications:
We make sure you don't miss anything. Just save your search and as soon as a new property matching your search criteria is published, you will be informed via push notifications. This way you can react quickly and apply right in the app.

Plan your relocation:
Create a free letter of cancellation for your current apartment. You can also get free cost estimates and compare prices for moving companies and save up to 40% on your move.

Financing:
Try out different financing scenarios in our app and get different offers. We will search for suitable offers for your real estate financing.

Find a real estate agent:
Receive agent recommendations for the sale of your property or find an agent yourself in our realtor-network.

Keep track of the property value:
For owners, every decision to sell a property begins with an examination of the property's value. Our free “Preisatlas” offers a starting point. You can also request a personal and free real estate appraisal.

Live viewing:
As a provider of a property, simply offer the showing via video call so that interested parties can participate from anywhere.

Chargeable services for tenants and buyers:
Present yourself in the best possible light with the digital application package. In the package, you can file your proof of income and your SCHUFA credit check, among other documents.
Your messages to providers are displayed at the top of the ImmoScout24 inbox.
MieterPlus is also very useful during an existing rental contract: tenancy law consulting and lockout insurance services are included.

We are working intensively on further features for our app. We would love to hear your feedback:
app-support@immobilienscout24.de

Your team from ImmoScout24

Contact & Help: https://www.immobilienscout24.de/kontakt.html

Follow ImmoScout24 on:
facebook https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24
instagram https://www.instagram.com/immobilienscout24
tiktok https://www.tiktok.com/@immoscout24
twitter https://twitter.com/immobilienscout

title: ImmoScout24 - Real Estate

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Whether renting, buying, or selling, either privately or commercially: We are Germany's number #1 for real estate!

Looking for a property for rent? Search for your dream home quickly and easily in our app. Just enter your search criteria – done.

Are you looking for a property for sale? Find your new home: Whether it's an apartment, terraced house, detached house or villa - you'll find a wide selection on our platform.

Or do you want to rent or sell a property? With the high reach of ImmoScout24, you can easily find the right tenants and buyers. Simply create a property ad in the app.

Narrow your search:
Search with many filter options (including apartment size, number of rooms, equipment criteria) near your current location, near a specific address or simply draw an area on the map.

Travel time calculator:
Let us calculate the travel time from the property to the places that are important to you (e.g. work, daycare, school...) right in the app.

Shortlist:
Keep track of already contacted and saved objects. Invite a person to share your shortlist with so you can keep track of your favorite properties.

Personal profile:
Create and edit your profile in the app and increase the chances of getting your dream property as soon as you make contact.

Messenger:
Communicate quickly and securely with providers via our messenger - directly in the app. Thanks to instant notifications, you're always up to date and can reply to messages immediately.

Push notifications:
We make sure you don't miss anything. Just save your search and as soon as a new property matching your search criteria is published, you will be informed via push notifications. This way you can react quickly and apply right in the app.

Plan your relocation:
Create a free letter of cancellation for your current apartment. You can also get free cost estimates and compare prices for moving companies and save up to 40% on your move.

Financing:
Try out different financing scenarios in our app and get different offers. We will search for suitable offers for your real estate financing.

Find a real estate agent:
Receive agent recommendations for the sale of your property or find an agent yourself in our realtor-network.

Keep track of the property value:
For owners, every decision to sell a property begins with an examination of the property's value. Our free “Preisatlas” offers a starting point. You can also request a personal and free real estate appraisal.

Live viewing:
As a provider of a property, simply offer the showing via video call so that interested parties can participate from anywhere.

Chargeable services for tenants and buyers:
Present yourself in the best possible light with the digital application package. In the package, you can file your proof of income and your SCHUFA credit check, among other documents.
Your messages to providers are displayed at the top of the ImmoScout24 inbox.
MieterPlus is also very useful during an existing rental contract: tenancy law consulting and lockout insurance services are included.

We are working intensively on further features for our app. We would love to hear your feedback:
app-support@immobilienscout24.de

title: ImmoScout24 - Real Estate

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Whether renting, buying, or selling, either privately or commercially: We are Germany's number #1 for real estate!

Looking for a property for rent? Search for your dream home quickly and easily in our app. Just enter your search criteria – done.

Are you looking for a property for sale? Find your new home: Whether it's an apartment, terraced house, detached house or villa - you'll find a wide selection on our platform.

Or do you want to rent or sell a property? With the high reach of ImmoScout24, you can easily find the right tenants and buyers. Simply create a property ad in the app.

Narrow your search:
Search with many filter options (including apartment size, number of rooms, equipment criteria) near your current location, near a specific address or simply draw an area on the map.

Travel time calculator:
Let us calculate the travel time from the property to the places that are important to you (e.g. work, daycare, school...) right in the app.

Shortlist:
Keep track of already contacted and saved objects. Invite a person to share your shortlist with so you can keep track of your favorite properties.

Personal profile:
Create and edit your profile in the app and increase the chances of getting your dream property as soon as you make contact.

Messenger:
Communicate quickly and securely with providers via our messenger - directly in the app. Thanks to instant notifications, you're always up to date and can reply to messages immediately.

Push notifications:
We make sure you don't miss anything. Just save your search and as soon as a new property matching your search criteria is published, you will be informed via push notifications. This way you can react quickly and apply right in the app.

Plan your relocation:
Create a free letter of cancellation for your current apartment. You can also get free cost estimates and compare prices for moving companies and save up to 40% on your move.

Financing:
Try out different financing scenarios in our app and get different offers. We will search for suitable offers for your real estate financing.

Find a real estate agent:
Receive agent recommendations for the sale of your property or find an agent yourself in our realtor-network.

Keep track of the property value:
For owners, every decision to sell a property begins with an examination of the property's value. Our free “Preisatlas” offers a starting point. You can also request a personal and free real estate appraisal.

Live viewing:
As a provider of a property, simply offer the showing via video call so that interested parties can participate from anywhere.

Chargeable services for tenants and buyers:
Present yourself in the best possible light with the digital application package. In the package, you can file your proof of income and your SCHUFA credit check, among other documents.
Your messages to providers are displayed at the top of the ImmoScout24 inbox.
MieterPlus is also very useful during an existing rental contract: tenancy law consulting and lockout insurance services are included.

We are working intensively on further features for our app. We would love to hear your feedback:
app-support@immobilienscout24.de

Your team from ImmoScout24

Contact & Help: https://www.immobilienscout24.de/kontakt.html

instagram https://www.instagram.com/immobilienscout24

title: ImmoScout24 - Real Estate

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Whether renting, buying, or selling, either privately or commercially: We are Germany's number #1 for real estate!

Looking for a property for rent? Search for your dream home quickly and easily in our app. Just enter your search criteria – done.

Are you looking for a property for sale? Find your new home: Whether it's an apartment, terraced house, detached house or villa - you'll find a wide selection on our platform.

Or do you want to rent or sell a property? With the high reach of ImmoScout24, you can easily find the right tenants and buyers. Simply create a property ad in the app.

Narrow your search:
Search with many filter options (including apartment size, number of rooms, equipment criteria) near your current location, near a specific address or simply draw an area on the map.

Travel time calculator:
Let us calculate the travel time from the property to the places that are important to you (e.g. work, daycare, school...) right in the app.

Shortlist:
Keep track of already contacted and saved objects. Invite a person to share your shortlist with so you can keep track of your favorite properties.

Personal profile:
Create and edit your profile in the app and increase the chances of getting your dream property as soon as you make contact.

Messenger:
Communicate quickly and securely with providers via our messenger - directly in the app. Thanks to instant notifications, you're always up to date and can reply to messages immediately.

Push notifications:
We make sure you don't miss anything. Just save your search and as soon as a new property matching your search criteria is published, you will be informed via push notifications. This way you can react quickly and apply right in the app.

Plan your relocation:
Create a free letter of cancellation for your current apartment. You can also get free cost estimates and compare prices for moving companies and save up to 40% on your move.

Financing:
Try out different financing scenarios in our app and get different offers. We will search for suitable offers for your real estate financing.

Find a real estate agent:
Receive agent recommendations for the sale of your property or find an agent yourself in our realtor-network.

Keep track of the property value:
For owners, every decision to sell a property begins with an examination of the property's value. Our free “Preisatlas” offers a starting point. You can also request a personal and free real estate appraisal.

Live viewing:
As a provider of a property, simply offer the showing via video call so that interested parties can participate from anywhere.

Chargeable services for tenants and buyers:
Present yourself in the best possible light with the digital application package. In the package, you can file your proof of income and your SCHUFA credit check, among other documents.
Your messages to providers are displayed at the top of the ImmoScout24 inbox.
MieterPlus is also very useful during an existing rental contract: tenancy law consulting and lockout insurance services are included.

We are working intensively on further features for our app. We would love to hear your feedback:
app-support@immobilienscout24.de

Your team from ImmoScout24

Contact & Help: https://www.immobilienscout24.de/kontakt.html

instagram https://www.instagram.com/immobilienscout24
tiktok https://www.tiktok.com/@immoscout24
twitter https://twitter.com/immobilienscout

title: ImmoScout24 - Real Estate

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Whether renting, buying, or selling, either privately or commercially: We are Germany's number #1 for real estate!

Looking for a property for rent? Search for your dream home quickly and easily in our app. Just enter your search criteria – done.

Are you looking for a property for sale? Find your new home: Whether it's an apartment, terraced house, detached house or villa - you'll find a wide selection on our platform.

Or do you want to rent or sell a property? With the high reach of ImmoScout24, you can easily find the right tenants and buyers. Simply create a property ad in the app.

Narrow your search:
Search with many filter options (including apartment size, number of rooms, equipment criteria) near your current location, near a specific address or simply draw an area on the map.

Travel time calculator:
Let us calculate the travel time from the property to the places that are important to you (e.g. work, daycare, school...) right in the app.

Shortlist:
Keep track of already contacted and saved objects. Invite a person to share your shortlist with so you can keep track of your favorite properties.

Personal profile:
Create and edit your profile in the app and increase the chances of getting your dream property as soon as you make contact.

Messenger:
Communicate quickly and securely with providers via our messenger - directly in the app. Thanks to instant notifications, you're always up to date and can reply to messages immediately.

Push notifications:
We make sure you don't miss anything. Just save your search and as soon as a new property matching your search criteria is published, you will be informed via push notifications. This way you can react quickly and apply right in the app.

Plan your relocation:
Create a free letter of cancellation for your current apartment. You can also get free cost estimates and compare prices for moving companies and save up to 40% on your move.

Financing:
Try out different financing scenarios in our app and get different offers. We will search for suitable offers for your real estate financing.

Find a real estate agent:
Receive agent recommendations for the sale of your property or find an agent yourself in our realtor-network.

Keep track of the property value:
For owners, every decision to sell a property begins with an examination of the property's value. Our free “Preisatlas” offers a starting point. You can also request a personal and free real estate appraisal.

Live viewing:
As a provider of a property, simply offer the showing via video call so that interested parties can participate from anywhere.

Chargeable services for tenants and buyers:
Present yourself in the best possible light with the digital application package. In the package, you can file your proof of income and your SCHUFA credit check, among other documents.
Your messages to providers are displayed at the top of the ImmoScout24 inbox.
MieterPlus is also very useful during an existing rental contract: tenancy law consulting and lockout insurance services are included.

We are working intensively on further features for our app. We would love to hear your feedback:
app-support@immobilienscout24.de

Your team from ImmoScout24

Contact & Help: https://www.immobilienscout24.de/kontakt.html

Follow ImmoScout24 on:
facebook https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24
instagram https://www.instagram.com/immobilienscout24
tiktok https://www.tiktok.com/@immoscout24
twitter https://twitter.com/immobilienscout

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Whether renting, buying, or selling, either privately or commercially: We are Germany's number #1 for real estate!

Looking for a property for rent? Search for your dream home quickly and easily in our app. Just enter your search criteria – done.

Are you looking for a property for sale? Find your new home: Whether it's an apartment, terraced house, detached house or villa - you'll find a wide selection on our platform.

Or do you want to rent or sell a property? With the high reach of ImmoScout24, you can easily find the right tenants and buyers. Simply create a property ad in the app.

Narrow your search:
Search with many filter options (including apartment size, number of rooms, equipment criteria) near your current location, near a specific address or simply draw an area on the map.

Travel time calculator:
Let us calculate the travel time from the property to the places that are important to you (e.g. work, daycare, school...) right in the app.

Shortlist:
Keep track of already contacted and saved objects. Invite a person to share your shortlist with so you can keep track of your favorite properties.

Personal profile:
Create and edit your profile in the app and increase the chances of getting your dream property as soon as you make contact.

Messenger:
Communicate quickly and securely with providers via our messenger - directly in the app. Thanks to instant notifications, you're always up to date and can reply to messages immediately.

Push notifications:
We make sure you don't miss anything. Just save your search and as soon as a new property matching your search criteria is published, you will be informed via push notifications. This way you can react quickly and apply right in the app.

Plan your relocation:
Create a free letter of cancellation for your current apartment. You can also get free cost estimates and compare prices for moving companies and save up to 40% on your move.

Financing:
Try out different financing scenarios in our app and get different offers. We will search for suitable offers for your real estate financing.

Find a real estate agent:
Receive agent recommendations for the sale of your property or find an agent yourself in our realtor-network.

Keep track of the property value:
For owners, every decision to sell a property begins with an examination of the property's value. Our free “Preisatlas” offers a starting point. You can also request a personal and free real estate appraisal.

Live viewing:
As a provider of a property, simply offer the showing via video call so that interested parties can participate from anywhere.

Chargeable services for tenants and buyers:
Present yourself in the best possible light with the digital application package. In the package, you can file your proof of income and your SCHUFA credit check, among other documents.
Your messages to providers are displayed at the top of the ImmoScout24 inbox.
MieterPlus is also very useful during an existing rental contract: tenancy law consulting and lockout insurance services are included.

We are working intensively on further features for our app. We would love to hear your feedback:
app-support@immobilienscout24.de

Your team from ImmoScout24

Contact & Help: https://www.immobilienscout24.de/kontakt.html

Follow ImmoScout24 on:
facebook https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24
instagram https://www.instagram.com/immobilienscout24
tiktok https://www.tiktok.com/@immoscout24
twitter https://twitter.com/immobilienscout
descriptionShort: Find, rent and buy real estate or property in Germany with the ImmoScout24 app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: For this version we did some design adjustments and made a few stability improvements.

Looking for a property for rent? Search for your dream home quickly and easily in our app. Just enter your search criteria – done.

Are you looking for a property for sale? Find your new home: Whether it's an apartment, terraced house, detached house or villa - you'll find a wide selection on our platform.

Or do you want to rent or sell a property? With the high reach of ImmoScout24, you can easily find the right tenants and buyers. Simply create a property ad in the app.

Narrow your search:
Search with many filter options (including apartment size, number of rooms, equipment criteria) near your current location, near a specific address or simply draw an area on the map.

Travel time calculator:
Let us calculate the travel time from the property to the places that are important to you (e.g. work, daycare, school...) right in the app.

Shortlist:
Keep track of already contacted and saved objects. Invite a person to share your shortlist with so you can keep track of your favorite properties.

Personal profile:
Create and edit your profile in the app and increase the chances of getting your dream property as soon as you make contact.

Messenger:
Communicate quickly and securely with providers via our messenger - directly in the app. Thanks to instant notifications, you're always up to date and can reply to messages immediately.

Push notifications:
We make sure you don't miss anything. Just save your search and as soon as a new property matching your search criteria is published, you will be informed via push notifications. This way you can react quickly and apply right in the app.

Plan your relocation:
Create a free letter of cancellation for your current apartment. You can also get free cost estimates and compare prices for moving companies and save up to 40% on your move.

Financing:
Try out different financing scenarios in our app and get different offers. We will search for suitable offers for your real estate financing.

Find a real estate agent:
Receive agent recommendations for the sale of your property or find an agent yourself in our realtor-network.

Keep track of the property value:
For owners, every decision to sell a property begins with an examination of the property's value. Our free “Preisatlas” offers a starting point. You can also request a personal and free real estate appraisal.

Live viewing:
As a provider of a property, simply offer the showing via video call so that interested parties can participate from anywhere.

Chargeable services for tenants and buyers:
Present yourself in the best possible light with the digital application package. In the package, you can file your proof of income and your SCHUFA credit check, among other documents.
Your messages to providers are displayed at the top of the ImmoScout24 inbox.
MieterPlus is also very useful during an existing rental contract: tenancy law consulting and lockout insurance services are included.

We are working intensively on further features for our app. We would love to hear your feedback:
app-support@immobilienscout24.de

Your team from ImmoScout24

Contact & Help: https://www.immobilienscout24.de/kontakt.html

Follow ImmoScout24 on:
facebook https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24
instagram https://www.instagram.com/immobilienscout24
tiktok https://www.tiktok.com/@immoscout24
twitter https://twitter.com/immobilienscout
descriptionShort: Find, rent and buy real estate or property in Germany with the ImmoScout24 app.

Looking for a property for rent? Search for your dream home quickly and easily in our app. Just enter your search criteria – done.

Are you looking for a property for sale? Find your new home: Whether it's an apartment, terraced house, detached house or villa - you'll find a wide selection on our platform.

Or do you want to rent or sell a property? With the high reach of ImmoScout24, you can easily find the right tenants and buyers. Simply create a property ad in the app.

Narrow your search:
Search with many filter options (including apartment size, number of rooms, equipment criteria) near your current location, near a specific address or simply draw an area on the map.

Travel time calculator:
Let us calculate the travel time from the property to the places that are important to you (e.g. work, daycare, school...) right in the app.

Shortlist:
Keep track of already contacted and saved objects. Invite a person to share your shortlist with so you can keep track of your favorite properties.

Personal profile:
Create and edit your profile in the app and increase the chances of getting your dream property as soon as you make contact.

Messenger:
Communicate quickly and securely with providers via our messenger - directly in the app. Thanks to instant notifications, you're always up to date and can reply to messages immediately.

Push notifications:
We make sure you don't miss anything. Just save your search and as soon as a new property matching your search criteria is published, you will be informed via push notifications. This way you can react quickly and apply right in the app.

Plan your relocation:
Create a free letter of cancellation for your current apartment. You can also get free cost estimates and compare prices for moving companies and save up to 40% on your move.

Financing:
Try out different financing scenarios in our app and get different offers. We will search for suitable offers for your real estate financing.

Find a real estate agent:
Receive agent recommendations for the sale of your property or find an agent yourself in our realtor-network.

Keep track of the property value:
For owners, every decision to sell a property begins with an examination of the property's value. Our free “Preisatlas” offers a starting point. You can also request a personal and free real estate appraisal.

Live viewing:
As a provider of a property, simply offer the showing via video call so that interested parties can participate from anywhere.

Chargeable services for tenants and buyers:
Present yourself in the best possible light with the digital application package. In the package, you can file your proof of income and your SCHUFA credit check, among other documents.
Your messages to providers are displayed at the top of the ImmoScout24 inbox.
MieterPlus is also very useful during an existing rental contract: tenancy law consulting and lockout insurance services are included.

We are working intensively on further features for our app. We would love to hear your feedback:
app-support@immobilienscout24.de

Your team from ImmoScout24

Contact & Help: https://www.immobilienscout24.de/kontakt.html

Follow ImmoScout24 on:
facebook https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24
instagram https://www.instagram.com/immobilienscout24
tiktok https://www.tiktok.com/@immoscout24
twitter https://twitter.com/immobilienscout
descriptionShort: Find, rent and buy real estate or property in Germany with the ImmoScout24 app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version you will discover our new messenger that allows you to send messages faster, better and easier. You can now also create draft messages with attachments and send them later. Nothing gets lost anymore! In addition, you can now access deactivated exposés by clicking on the messenger header.
Also try our new feature "Offer price" in the exposé! You can quickly and easily make a counter offer to vendors. Use our new button "Suggest a price" in the buy-exposé.

title: ImmoScout24 - Real Estate

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Whether renting, buying, or selling, either privately or commercially: We are Germany's number 1 for real estate!

Looking for a property for rent? Search for your dream home quickly and easily in our app. Just enter your search criteria – done.

Are you looking for a property for sale? Find your new home: Whether it's an apartment, terraced house, detached house or villa - you'll find a wide selection on our platform.

Or do you want to rent or sell a property? With the high reach of ImmoScout24, you can easily find the right tenants and buyers. Simply create a property ad in the app.

Narrow your search:
Search with many filter options (including apartment size, number of rooms, equipment criteria) near your current location, near a specific address or simply draw an area on the map.

Travel time calculator:
Let us calculate the travel time from the property to the places that are important to you (e.g. work, daycare, school...) right in the app.

Shortlist:
Keep track of already contacted and saved objects. Invite a person to share your shortlist with so you can keep track of your favorite properties.

Personal profile:
Create and edit your profile in the app and increase the chances of getting your dream property as soon as you make contact.

Messenger:
Communicate quickly and securely with providers via our messenger - directly in the app. Thanks to instant notifications, you're always up to date and can reply to messages immediately.

Push notifications:
We make sure you don't miss anything. Just save your search and as soon as a new property matching your search criteria is published, you will be informed via push notifications. This way you can react quickly and apply right in the app.

Plan your relocation:
Create a free letter of cancellation for your current apartment. You can also get free cost estimates and compare prices for moving companies and save up to 40% on your move.

Financing:
Try out different financing scenarios in our app and get different offers. We will search for suitable offers for your real estate financing.

Find a real estate agent:
Receive agent recommendations for the sale of your property or find an agent yourself in our realtor-network.

Keep track of the property value:
For owners, every decision to sell a property begins with an examination of the property's value. Our free “Preisatlas” offers a starting point. You can also request a personal and free real estate appraisal.

Live viewing:
As a provider of a property, simply offer the showing via video call so that interested parties can participate from anywhere.

Chargeable services for tenants and buyers:
Present yourself in the best possible light with the digital application package. In the package, you can file your proof of income and your SCHUFA credit check, among other documents.
Your messages to providers are displayed at the top of the ImmoScout24 inbox.
MieterPlus is also very useful during an existing rental contract: tenancy law consulting and lockout insurance services are included.

We are working intensively on further features for our app. We would love to hear your feedback:
app-support@immobilienscout24.de

Your team from ImmoScout24

Contact & Help: https://www.immobilienscout24.de/kontakt.html

facebook https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24
instagram https://www.instagram.com/immobilienscout24
tiktok https://www.tiktok.com/@immoscout24
twitter https://twitter.com/immobilienscout

title: ImmoScout24 - Real Estate

creator: Immobilien Scout GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Whether renting, buying, or selling, either privately or commercially: We are Germany's number 1 for real estate!

Looking for a property for rent? Search for your dream home quickly and easily in our app. Just enter your search criteria – done.

Are you looking for a property for sale? Find your new home: Whether it's an apartment, terraced house, detached house or villa - you'll find a wide selection on our platform.

Or do you want to rent or sell a property? With the high reach of ImmoScout24, you can easily find the right tenants and buyers. Simply create a property ad in the app.

Narrow your search:
Search with many filter options (including apartment size, number of rooms, equipment criteria) near your current location, near a specific address or simply draw an area on the map.

Travel time calculator:
Let us calculate the travel time from the property to the places that are important to you (e.g. work, daycare, school...) right in the app.

Shortlist:
Keep track of already contacted and saved objects. Invite a person to share your shortlist with so you can keep track of your favorite properties.

Personal profile:
Create and edit your profile in the app and increase the chances of getting your dream property as soon as you make contact.

Messenger:
Communicate quickly and securely with providers via our messenger - directly in the app. Thanks to instant notifications, you're always up to date and can reply to messages immediately.

Push notifications:
We make sure you don't miss anything. Just save your search and as soon as a new property matching your search criteria is published, you will be informed via push notifications. This way you can react quickly and apply right in the app.

Plan your relocation:
Create a free letter of cancellation for your current apartment. You can also get free cost estimates and compare prices for moving companies and save up to 40% on your move.

Financing:
Try out different financing scenarios in our app and get different offers. We will search for suitable offers for your real estate financing.

Find a real estate agent:
Receive agent recommendations for the sale of your property or find an agent yourself in our realtor-network.

Keep track of the property value:
For owners, every decision to sell a property begins with an examination of the property's value. Our free “Preisatlas” offers a starting point. You can also request a personal and free real estate appraisal.

Live viewing:
As a provider of a property, simply offer the showing via video call so that interested parties can participate from anywhere.

Chargeable services for tenants and buyers:
Present yourself in the best possible light with the digital application package. In the package, you can file your proof of income and your SCHUFA credit check, among other documents.
Your messages to providers are displayed at the top of the ImmoScout24 inbox.
MieterPlus is also very useful during an existing rental contract: tenancy law consulting and lockout insurance services are included.

We are working intensively on further features for our app. We would love to hear your feedback:
app-support@immobilienscout24.de

Your team from ImmoScout24

Contact & Help: https://www.immobilienscout24.de/kontakt.html

Follow ImmoScout24 on:
facebook https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24
instagram https://www.instagram.com/immobilienscout24
tiktok https://www.tiktok.com/@immoscout24
twitter https://twitter.com/immobilienscout
descriptionShort: Find, rent and buy real estate or property in Germany with the ImmoScout24 app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are excited to introduce the latest version of our real estate app! In this version, we’ve made updates to enhance your real estate experience:
- Reduced Price in Buy-Property Listings: Starting now, we display the reduced price of a property in its listing if the price has changed since its initial publication. This feature allows you to immediately identify whether the property’s price has been reduced, potentially presenting you with a fantastic opportunity.

Messenger:
Communicate quickly and securely with providers via our messenger - directly in the app. Thanks to instant notifications, you're always up to date and can reply to messages immediately.

Push notifications:
We make sure you don't miss anything. Just save your search and as soon as a new property matching your search criteria is published, you will be informed via push notifications. This way you can react quickly and apply right in the app.

Plan your relocation:
Create a free letter of cancellation for your current apartment. You can also get free cost estimates and compare prices for moving companies and save up to 40% on your move.

Financing:
Try out different financing scenarios in our app and get different offers. We will search for suitable offers for your real estate financing.

Find a real estate agent:
Receive agent recommendations for the sale of your property or find an agent yourself in our realtor-network.

Keep track of the property value:
For owners, every decision to sell a property begins with an examination of the property's value. Our free “Preisatlas” offers a starting point. You can also request a personal and free real estate appraisal.

Live viewing:
As a provider of a property, simply offer the showing via video call so that interested parties can participate from anywhere.

Chargeable services for tenants and buyers:
Present yourself in the best possible light with the digital application package. In the package, you can file your proof of income and your SCHUFA credit check, among other documents.
Your messages to providers are displayed at the top of the ImmoScout24 inbox.
MieterPlus is also very useful during an existing rental contract: tenancy law consulting and lockout insurance services are included.

We are working intensively on further features for our app. We would love to hear your feedback:
app-support@immobilienscout24.de

Your team from ImmoScout24

Contact & Help: https://www.immobilienscout24.de/kontakt.html

Follow ImmoScout24 on:
facebook https://www.facebook.com/ImmobilienScout24
instagram https://www.instagram.com/immobilienscout24
tiktok https://www.tiktok.com/@immoscout24
twitter https://twitter.com/immobilienscout
descriptionShort: Find, rent and buy real estate or property in Germany with the ImmoScout24 app.

🏠 ImmoScout24 is Germany's No. 1 real estate portal.
Are you looking for an apartment? Do you want to rent, let, buy or sell a property? Private or commercial? Then you've come to the right place! We'll help you make your dream home a reality. Immerse yourself in the world of property.

Why ImmoScout24?
✅ We have the most adverts in Germany.
✅ We have the most searchers.
✅ Our customers are the most satisfied!
✅ 4 out of 5 find their new home with us!

Are you looking to rent or buy property?

📍 Narrow down your search: Flat or house, to buy or rent?
Filter by address, town & district.
✏️ Draw your search area: Stay flexible and draw your search area on the map.
🔎 Filter in detail: Use numerous filter options such as size, number of rooms, price. You can also use your own criteria for your apartment search.
🏘️ WG wanted: Filter by number of flatmates or rental period. Find all flats from WG-Gesucht in our app.
🔔 Stay informed: Receive push notifications as soon as new adverts are posted online.
📝 Create a notepad: Keep track of your search requests & favourites.
🤝 Search together: Share your favourites & find a new home faster.
⏳ Calculate journey time: Calculate the distance to work, daycare or school.
💬 Get in contact: Communicate directly with providers. Push messages inform you immediately about the answer.
📈 Increase your opportunities: Use all the advantages of MieterPlus for your apartment search & find your new home faster (subject to a fee).
📄 SCHUFA enquiry: Get your SCHUFA credit check in just 3 minutes.
👤 Create a profile: Introduce yourself with your personal details & provide important documents for a successful flat search.
📦 Plan your move: Get free moving quotes & save up to 40%.
🏦 Compare financing options: Get non-binding advice and find the best financing offer.
❔ Check your chances: Check the chances of finding your dream property with MieterPlus and KäuferPlus (subject to a fee).

Want to let or sell property?

💶 Use the price atlas and real estate valuation: Get a free valuation of your property.
🔝 Create a listing: Put your property online. With just a few clicks - and from just €0.
🏷️ Find a real estate agent: Benefit from Germany's largest estate agent network and sell at top prices.


ImmoScout24 is Germany's leading platform for real estate: whether it's a flat, house or plot of land. Whether private or commercial, for rent or for sale - our platform offers access to the world of property. We can help you find an apartment or the house of your dreams. Here you will find adverts from WG-Gesucht, private providers, estate agents and the largest housing associations such as Vonovia, degewo and HOWOGE. Apply for the flat or house of your dreams with just a few clicks and save yourself individual searches on Wohnungsswap.de, Vonovia, degewo, HOWOGE or WG-Gesucht.de. With just a few clicks, you can apply for your SCHUFA certificate and add it to your profile. This makes it easier for you to find a flat.

See for yourself and download the ImmoScout24 app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version you can assess listings at a glance - clearly & objectively with a new price evaluation. It is based on highly developed algorithms from Sprengnetter. Our partner uses over 10 million real estate data records in Germany for this purpose.
Listings are automatically evaluated on the basis of criteria such as location, construction year, living space, etc.
